data.actual_result: The badge is present but it is embedded into a white background which gives it a white border.
data.expected_result: You should get a red notification badge that looks as it does normally when viewing the server icon when not sorting servers
data.short_description: Notification badge has a white border which makes it look odd while sorting servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Get someone to mention you in a server so that you have the red notification badge - Long press the server icon - Scroll all the way down to sort [server name] and click on it - Scroll to the server in which you have been mentioned  - Observe the notification badge
